body:
I have decided to leave Avicus I might be on once in a while... I guess insteed of trying to push off what went down tonight I shall embrace it as my leaving
Build: Public is switching to really private and only exeptions will be made to use it.

Also I did ask for this to be locked, I don't want comments making me stay around.
